entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
